DOC.brief_title: A Dose Finding Study Of PF-00489791 In Patients With Mild To Moderate High Blood Pressure
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males and/or Females nonchildbearing potential 18 70 year age 2 . History mild moderate hypertension 1 . Type 1 2 diabetes prescribe medication 2 . Secondary , severe , malignant hypertension 3 . History significant cardiovascular event within last 12 month enrollment
DOC.keyword: Clinical Trial , Randomized Controlled Trial , Humans , Cyclic Nucleotide Phosphodiesterases Type 5
